SecurityQuestions.description: Configuration for security questions used in authentication and account recovery

enabled.description: Whether security questions feature is enabled

questionSettings.description: Settings related to security questions configuration

minQuestions.description: Minimum number of security questions a user must set up

maxQuestions.description: Maximum number of security questions a user can set up

allowCustomQuestions.description: Whether users can create their own custom security questions

predefinedQuestions.description: List of predefined security questions available for users

answerSettings.description: Settings related to security question answers

minLength.description: Minimum length required for security question answers

maxLength.description: Maximum length allowed for security question answers

caseSensitive.description: Whether answers are case-sensitive during verification

allowPlainText.description: Whether to allow plain text answers instead of selecting from predefined options

algorithm.description: Encryption algorithm to use for storing answers

keyId.description: ID of the encryption key to use

challengeSettings.description: Settings for security question challenges during authentication or recovery

questionsPerChallenge.description: Number of questions to present during a challenge

maxAttempts.description: Maximum number of failed attempts before lockout

lockoutDuration.description: Duration of lockout in minutes after max attempts reached

randomizeQuestions.description: Whether to randomize the order of questions during challenges

recoverySettings.description: Settings for account recovery using security questions

enabled.description: Whether security questions can be used for account recovery

requireAdditionalVerification.description: Whether additional verification (e.g., email, SMS) is required along with security questions

additionalVerificationMethods.description: List of additional verification methods required during recovery
